caption: I love the decor the food and the waiter was amazing to us, we ordered a lot and everything was delicious, the clams spaghetti was cooked perfectly and everything raw we had was memorable, they cooked my toddler fish and veg and homemade almond ice cream for dessert which was perfect for him, thank you we will be returning soon :)

I Just ate in this place and I order the specialty of the house Fiorentina Del Macellaio (T-Bone) and how was my sorpresa when the waiter bring me and show me a ribeye so I told him it’s not a T-Bone and he insisted in to affirm  They bring …
the place is nice and the food the best in Miami 🤤👌🏼
